price: 107. Ni-Rabbow girak nee eyyecqaay, addunyâ fanah nee gacis, tokkel nanu koroosannuu kee umaaneh gacnek, toysa nanu diggah ninni nafsi koroosannut yudlume mara akkennok iyyan.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā akhrij'nā min'hā fa-in ʿud'nā fa-innā ẓālimūna
